related_questions.question:
My New Backpack    I have a new backpack. Its color is soft green. I
always bring it when I go to school. It is made of strong
fabric. There are several parts of my backpack. The first
part is the pocket. I put my money and my library card
in the pocket. The second part is the main part. I put my
books and pencil case in this part. The third part is a
small pocket on the left side of the backpack. I keep a
bottle of water in this pocket.
1. How many parts of the writer's backpack?
2. What is the function of the main part of the backpack?
3. blue - He-pale-has-eyes - skin - and
1 2 3 4
4 5
5 6 7
nac these sentences into the correct order.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.three parts

2.to put his books and pencil case

3.he has blue eyes and pale skin

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

1. four [ 4 ]

2.in pocket I can put my money and my library card.

the second is i can also put a pencil and book holder

and the last thing is that I can put a water bottle in the side pocket

3. [ sorry nomor tiga aku ga tau jawaban nya ]

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu, Semangat belajar nya

statements for correct answers.

Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)

related_questions.question: Tulisan Arab .innal insaana fii akhsani takwin​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ

Penjelasan:

At Tin: Buah Tin

وَالتِّيْنِ وَالزَّيْتُوْنِ ﴿التين:١

wattiini waz zaituun

1. Demi (buah) Tin dan (buah) Zaitun,

وَطُوْرِ سِيْنِيْنَ ﴿التين:٢

watuuri siiniin

2. demi Gunung Sinai,

وَهٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِيْنِ ﴿التين:٣

wahaadzal baladil amiin

3. dan demi negeri (Mekah) yang aman ini;

لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ ﴿التين:٤

laqod kholaqnal insaana fii ahsani taqwiim

4. Sungguh, Kami telah menciptakan manusia dalam bentuk yang sebaik-baiknya,

ثُمَّ رَدَدْنٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سٰفِلِيْنَ ﴿التين:٥

tsumma rodadnaahu asfala saafiliin

5. kemudian Kami kembalikan dia ke tempat yang serendah-rendahnya,

إِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ الصّٰلِحٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍ ﴿التين:٦

illal ladziina aamanuu wa’amilus shoolihaati falahum ajrun ghoiru mamnuun

6. kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan; maka mereka akan mendapat pahala yang tidak ada putus-putusnya,

فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّيْنِ ﴿التين:٧

famaa yukadzdzibuka ba’du bid diin

7. Maka apa yang menyebabkan (mereka) mendustakanmu (tentang) hari pembalasan setelah (adanya keterangan-keterangan) itu?

أَلَيْسَ اللهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ ﴿التين:٨

alaisalloohu bi-ahkamil haakimiin

8. Bukankah Allah hakim yang paling adil?

#Semoga bermanfaat
